channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Eight more UK universities cut recruitment ties with fossil fuel industry
item.description: Manchester Metropolitan University again wins top spot for climate and social justice in league table More universities have severed ties with fossil ...

item.title: Merz says European leaders had ‘constructive’ call with Trump as he plays down tensions with US – Europe live
item.description: German chancellor says conversation focused on ‘what territorial concessions Ukraine is prepared to make’ Nato’s Rutte largely sticks to usual pleasan...

item.title: Trump’s strategy has echoes of ‘extreme rightwing tropes’ from 1930s, former minister tells MPs – UK politics live
item.description: Liam Byrne says language of the US national security strategy was ‘deeply regrettable’ and highlighted the need for strong UK-EU economic security lin...

item.title: US lawmakers voice concerns about Venezuelan tanker seizure: ‘sounds a lot like the beginning of a war’ – US politics live
item.description: Republican senator Rand Paul said it was ‘not the job of the American government to go looking for monsters around the world’ Chris Van Hollen , the D...

item.title: Brian Eno urges support to get Together for Palestine song to Christmas No 1
item.description: Lullaby features Palestinian singer, lyrics written by Peter Gabriel and artists including Eno and Celeste The Together for Palestine fund is trying t...

item.title: US seizes oil tanker off Venezuela as Caracas condemns 'act of piracy'
item.description: The move is a sharp escalation in Washington's pressure campaign against Nicolás Maduro's government.

item.title: Messi to unveil 70ft statue of himself on 'GOAT' tour
item.description: Lionel Messi is heading to India to unveil a 70ft statue of himself as part of a three-day 'GOAT Tour'.

item.title: Elite Coast Guard squad and 'dark fleet' ship - what we know about US seizure of oil tanker
item.description: The US seizure of a crude oil ship is the latest in a series of escalations in the Trump administration's pressure campaign on Venezuela.

item.title: Private flu vaccine stocks running low as cases rise in Scotland
item.description: Those eligible for a vaccine can access jabs from the NHS, but experts say that people have turned to pharmacies for convenience.

item.title: Hundreds of items taken in 'high value' Bristol museum raid
item.description: More than 600 artefacts from the museum's British Empire and Commonwealth collection were taken.
